item.title: Tips for Developing a Static Site Using Hugo
item.description: I’ve been asked a handful of times how this blog is written and maintained. The answer changed every time, as the blog’s gone through a couple of iterations in the time I’ve had it. I reckon that it’s in a good state now, so I thought that I’d collate and document what I found works well with developing a Hugo static site, and what I wished that I knew earlier.
